teaser: On today's show, Will Oremus talks about Microsoft's Surface Pro 3, and the company's goal of replacing the laptop. Plus, we have more on the ISEE-3 Reboot Project, a crowd-funded intiative to reboot and reclaim a 36-year-old space probe that on a trajectory past Earth. And last but not least: how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? Marketplace's own Kai Ryssdal joins us for this week's Silicon Tally.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, May 23, 2014
description: On today's show, Will Oremus talks about Microsoft's Surface Pro 3, and the company's goal of replacing the laptop. Plus, we have more on the ISEE-3 Reboot Project, a crowd-funded intiative to reboot and reclaim a 36-year-old space probe that on a trajectory past Earth. And last but not least: how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? Marketplace's own Kai Ryssdal joins us for this week's Silicon Tally.
